code: import React,{Fragment,useRef}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{RecoveryEmailRequest}from'../../API/APIRequest';import{IsEmail}from'../helper/Delete/FormHelper/FormHelper';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SendOTP=function SendOTP(){var navigate=useNavigate();var emailRef=useRef();var onSubmit=function onSubmit(){var email=emailRef.value;if(IsEmail(email)){toast.error('email required',{position:"bottom-center"});}else{RecoveryEmailRequest(email).then(function(result){if(result===true){navigate('/verifyOTP');}});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__form__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Enter Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:function ref(input){return emailRef=input;},type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onClick:onSubmit,className:"login__btn",type:"button",value:"Next"})]})]})})})});};export default SendOTP;
